landing.page.title: Empower Your Cooperative!
landing.page.description: Empower your cooperative with management tools focused on transparency and collaborative participation.
landing.features.efforttracking.title: Track contributions and distribute benefits equitably.
landing.features.efforttracking.text: Equity as a core principle: strengthen trust in your project. The greatest challenge for a cooperative lies in determining each contributor's input. Our platform helps you monitor and evaluate contributions, ensuring benefits are distributed fairly.
landing.features.governance.title: Make decisions with openness and clarity.
landing.features.governance.text: Transparency as a guiding principle: give everyone in your organization a voice. Through open voting, clear reporting, and shared oversight, our governance tools ensure members understand how decisions are made, fostering integrity and collaboration at every step.
landing.features.findcontributors.title: Your own personalized cooperative platform.
landing.features.findcontributors.text: Effortless technology: centralize your cooperative’s administration and communication on a customizable site. Increase the visibility of your cooperative both internally and in the community.
